name: Streets of Cyberworld
description: Streets of Cyberworld is a competitive strategy card game set in dystopian cyberpunk setting of near future. The game explores a scenario of a faction conflicts in a world divided by opinions, policies, and ethics. Player will control a mercenary tasked with asserting faction control in certain areas, battling other mercenaries and devising new approaches. Developers aim to deliver gameplay with just a minimal influence of random and luck factors, more focused on players ability to use what he's got in ever-changing battlefield conditions. Streets of Cyberworld also offers a fresh mix of the collectible card game and classical board game mechanics, where players fight for board control instead of directly attacking each other.
